Text:
"This is the way the world ends. Not with a bang but a whimper." - T.S. Elliot "The Hollow Men"

I'm currently reviewing some more anime for you guys! ATM Full Metal Panic is looking promising, but the VAs are kinda lame :P

Please leave a little note at the end of your comics along the lines of "Eechi +1" or "Gore -1" etc, that'll help me know what my audience likes! :D
Thanks for the eps of this. I it is an old show but you think there is any way you could do Lupin III?

Well done sir, well done indeed.

Ecchi: +/-1
Violence: +1
Gore: +1
Extreme Violence: +1
Disturbing Violence: +2

F'd up violence is the way to go for me, i.e. claymore, gantz, corpse princess, higurashi.

Elfen Lied was a little weak on the violence but still great. Gantz took a little bit to get into but it got absolutely awesome later on when what's his face found his balls, ending sucked though. I would really like to find a show that is appallingly violent by my standards, that would be great. Not just gory and extreme but truly disturbing.
Thanks!

If you, hipo, could get gantz eng. dubbed, that'd be amazing..
Gantz S01E01 is up in 480p Dual Audio ;)

I really like the fact that the episodes are all separated just in case someone would like to get a specific episode but I suggest you make a torrent where there is all 12 episodes in one :O would make things alot easier for people who want it all in one shot.
Sweet thanks! I only needed 4 eps because a mass DL i got had the last 4 corrupt so thanks for the single eps!
